Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2009 04:50AM HeatherL wrote: Hello all I was diagnosed when my baby was 11 months old.  I was going back to work so had to cut her off breastfeeding and 4 weeks later found a huge lump.  Had lumpectomy and then mastectomy and 2 out of 11 nodes +.  Have finished 6 chemo and am now starting 25 sessions of radiation.  Also have an 7 and 5 year olds.  It is hard and stressful but doable.  The kids keep your busy and happy even at the hardest times.  I also am HER2 + so will continue to have Herceptin for a year as well as HER2+ women don't respond to Tamoxifen so I have to have an injection every 3 months to shut down my ovaries to make my post menopausal to take another hormonal drug. Stay positive Heather
